patthana2.10:43.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:45.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:47.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … sahajāte nava … pe … magge ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:54.1: Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana2.10:55.4: mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1

patthana2.10:57.2: vatthuṃ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:58.1: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paccayā sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:58.2: sārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …

patthana2.10:59.2: sārammaṇe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;

patthana2.10:63.4: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā sārammaṇā khandhā;

patthana2.10:64.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca … pe …

patthana2.10:80.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cattāri, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:82.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:84.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava … pe … magge tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:89.1: Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:89.2: sārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā;
patthana2.10:90.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:92.1: Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:92.2: ahetukaṃ sārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:92.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:93.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ, napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:96.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:101.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:101.2: sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:102.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:102.2: sārammaṇā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:103.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:103.2: sārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:105.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:105.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:105.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese … pe …
patthana2.10:105.17: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, sārammaṇe khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:105.20: cetopariyañāṇena sārammaṇacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.10:105.24: sārammaṇā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:106.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:106.2: ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:106.8: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:106.13: anārammaṇā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:108.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:108.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana2.10:108.12: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:108.16: sārammaṇe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:109.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:110.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:110.3: sārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:111.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:111.4: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:111.7: vatthuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana2.10:113.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:113.4: phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … satta (paṭiccavāre sahajātasadisā) …
patthana2.10:115.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:115.13: kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.10:115.27: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:116.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:116.5: utuṃ, bhojanaṃ, senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.10:116.14: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:118.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:118.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:120.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:121.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:123.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:123.4: sārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:123.8: sārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:124.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:124.4: sārammaṇā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:125.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:125.4: sārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:125.8: sārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:127.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:128.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:129.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:129.2: kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:131.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:132.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:133.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:134.1: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:134.2: cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:134.4: kāyindriyañca kāyaviññāṇañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:136.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi, maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi, sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:138.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:139.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:139.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:141.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:141.2: sārammaṇo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:142.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:143.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:144.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:145.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:145.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:145.11: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:146.1: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:146.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:146.8: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:146.12: sārammaṇo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:147.1: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā anārammaṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:147.4: sārammaṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:147.8: sārammaṇā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:147.10: sārammaṇā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:150.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate satta.
patthana2.10:152.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:153.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:154.1: Sārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa ca anārammaṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:155.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:156.1: Anārammaṇo dhammo sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:157.1: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā sārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:158.1: Sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā anārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:162.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta … pe … nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, na aññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta … pe … namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:164.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā … pe … nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi … pe … namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:166.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.10:173.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:173.2: cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:173.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:174.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:174.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:174.5: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:175.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:176.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:176.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:176.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:176.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:177.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:177.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:177.4: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:177.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:177.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā;
patthana2.10:177.8: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:179.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:180.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:180.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:181.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:182.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:182.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe paṭicca … pe …
patthana2.10:182.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:182.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:183.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:183.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:183.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā.
patthana2.10:186.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:190.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:190.2: ahetukaṃ cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:190.5: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:191.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:191.2: ahetukaṃ nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:191.6: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:192.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:193.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:193.2: ahetukaṃ nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:193.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:194.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:194.2: ahetukaṃ nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:194.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:194.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:196.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:197.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:198.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:198.2: cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:198.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:200.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana2.10:202.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.10:202.2: arūpe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, cittaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:202.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:203.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.10:203.2: arūpe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:204.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.10:205.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.10:205.2: arūpe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:205.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:206.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana2.10:206.2: arūpe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:206.4: nocitte khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:206.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca nocittā khandhā;
patthana2.10:206.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:209.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:210.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:211.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:211.2: nocitte khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:214.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:218.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca (sabbattha pañca), magge tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:225.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:225.2: cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:226.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:226.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:227.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:227.2: nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ;
patthana2.10:227.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:228.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:228.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:228.4: vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:228.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:228.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:229.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:229.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:229.4: cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:229.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā kaṭattārūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:229.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā. #1
patthana2.10:231.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:232.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:232.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:232.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:232.8: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇasahagatā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā nocittā khandhā. #1
patthana2.10:233.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:233.2: nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ;
patthana2.10:233.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:234.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:234.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:234.4: vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:234.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:234.9: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:235.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:235.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:235.4: cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe … pe …
patthana2.10:235.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:238.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:242.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:242.2: ahetukaṃ cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:242.5: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:243.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:243.2: ahetukaṃ nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:243.6: (yāva asaññasattā), cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:243.8: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇasahagatā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā nocittā khandhā vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:244.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:244.2: ahetuke nocitte khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ;
patthana2.10:244.5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:245.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:245.2: ahetukaṃ nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:245.4: vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:245.7: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:246.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocitto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:246.2: ahetukaṃ nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:246.7: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paccayā nocittā khandhā, cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:246.11: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:249.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:253.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, anantare pañca (sabbattha pañca), magge tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:258.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:259.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:259.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭho eko khandho;
patthana2.10:260.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:261.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:261.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:262.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:262.2: nocittaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:263.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:264.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:266.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbe kātabbā.
patthana2.10:271.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:271.2: nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:272.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:273.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:273.2: nocittā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:275.1: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:275.6: Cittaṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:276.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:276.4: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana2.10:276.10: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:276.11: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:276.12: ariyā nocitte pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:276.14: vatthuṃ nocitte khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:276.17: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:276.18: Cetopariyañāṇena nocittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:276.26: nocittā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:277.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:277.4: (paṭhamagamanasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ, imaṃ nānaṃ) rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.10:278.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:278.4: (paṭhamagamanasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ, imaṃ nānaṃ), rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:279.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:279.2: cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:281.1: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:282.1: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:282.4: cittaṃ garuṃ katvā nocittā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:282.6: cittādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:283.1: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:283.3: cittaṃ garuṃ katvā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:284.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:284.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, pubbe … pe …
patthana2.10:284.12: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:284.13: Phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:284.16: vatthuṃ nocitte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:284.18: nocittādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:285.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:285.2: (Dvepi gamanā paṭhamagamanasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati kātabbā.) #2
patthana2.10:286.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:288.1: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:288.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:289.1: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:289.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nocittānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:290.1: Citto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:290.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:291.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:292.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:292.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:292.4: Purimaṃ purimaṃ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nocittānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:292.5: cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:292.7: Purimaṃ purimaṃ cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:293.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo (paṭiccavārasadisā) …
patthana2.10:295.1: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:296.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:297.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:297.2: (Ime dvepi pūretukāmena sabbattha kātabbā, paṭhamagamanasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.10:298.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:298.5: cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:300.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:300.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:301.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:301.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:302.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:302.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:302.10: Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:302.15: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:302.19: vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:304.1: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:305.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:306.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:307.1: Citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:309.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:309.4: nocittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:309.8: nocittā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:310.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:310.8: nocittā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:311.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:311.4: nocittā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:311.8: nocittā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:313.1: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … pañca … āhārapaccayena paccayo … pañca … indriyapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.10:313.7: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.10:315.1: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:316.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:316.4: nocittā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:316.16: nocittā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:317.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:318.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:318.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:318.6: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:318.10: vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:319.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:321.1: Citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:322.1: Nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:323.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:324.1: Nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:324.4: nocitto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:324.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:325.1: Citto ca nocitto ca dhammā nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:325.4: nocitto eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:325.8: cittañca vatthuñca nocittānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇepi dve).
patthana2.10:325.10: cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:325.12: cittañca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇepi dve).
patthana2.10:325.14: cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:325.16: cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:325.18: cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:328.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate pañca.

patthana2.10:417.6: vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:418.1: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṃ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:418.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:418.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:418.8: cetasikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:418.10: cetasikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:419.1: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṃ paccayā acetasiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:419.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:419.6: cetasike khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṃ.
patthana2.10:420.1: Cetasikañca acetasikañca dhammaṃ paccayā cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:420.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:420.4: cetasikaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:423.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), purejāte nava, āsevane nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:427.1: Cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:428.1: (Nava pañhā pañcaviññāṇampi yathā ārammaṇapaccayā evaṃ kātabbaṃ, tīsuyeva moho. Sabbe pañhā pavattipaṭisandhiyā kātabbā asammohantena.)
patthana2.10:431.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:435.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:440.1: Cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:440.2: (Evaṃ pañcapi pañhā kātabbā, tīṇiyeva moho. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana2.10:443.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:445.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:450.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:450.2: cetasikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:451.1: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:451.2: cetasikā hetū cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:452.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:452.2: cetasikā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:454.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:454.2: cetasike khandhe ārabbha cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:454.6: Cetasike khandhe ārabbha cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:455.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:455.5: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:455.8: vatthuṃ acetasike khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:455.11: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:455.12: Cetopariyañāṇena acetasikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:455.20: acetasikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:456.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:456.7: vatthuṃ acetasike khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:456.10: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:456.11: Cetopariyañāṇena acetasikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:456.19: acetasikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:457.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:457.7: vatthuṃ acetasike khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:457.12: rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:457.16: acetasikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:458.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:458.2: cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:458.4: Cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:458.6: Cetasike khandhe ca cittañca ārabbha cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:460.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:460.4: cetasike khandhe garuṃ katvā cetasikā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:460.9: cetasike khandhe garuṃ katvā cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:460.11: cetasikādhipati cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:460.14: cetasike khandhe garuṃ katvā cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:460.16: cetasikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:461.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:461.6: nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa.
patthana2.10:461.10: vatthuṃ acetasike khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:462.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:462.11: vatthuṃ acetasike khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:463.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:463.8: (paṭhamagamanaṃ) acetasike khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:463.10: acetasikādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:464.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:466.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:466.2: purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:466.4: Purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:466.6: Purimā purimā cetasikā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:467.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:467.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:468.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:468.2: (Evaṃ tīṇi kātabbāni, paṭhamagamanasadisaṃ. Pūritvā kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.10:469.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:470.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava, sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava (paṭiccavārasadisaṃ), aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nava (paṭiccavārasadisaṃ), nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:472.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:472.5: cetasikā khandhā cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:472.9: Cetasikā khandhā cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.10:473.7: senāsanaṃ cittaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.10:473.17: patthanāya kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.10:474.7: senāsanaṃ cittaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe ….
patthana2.10:475.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:477.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:477.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:477.9: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:478.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:478.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:479.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:479.6: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:479.9: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:479.19: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:481.1: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:482.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:483.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:484.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:486.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:486.4: cetasikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:486.8: cetasikā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.10:487.4: cetasikā cetanā cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:487.8: cetasikā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:488.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:488.4: cetasikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:488.8: cetasikā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:490.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava …… āhārapaccayena paccayo … nava …… indriyapaccayena paccayo … nava …… jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.10:492.1: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:493.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:493.15: cittaṃ purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:494.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:494.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:495.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:495.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:495.10: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:496.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:498.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:499.1: Cetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:500.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:501.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:502.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:502.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:503.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:503.4: cittaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:503.7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cetasikānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:504.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:504.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:504.8: cetasiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:504.12: cetasiko eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:505.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:505.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana2.10:505.8: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:505.9: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:505.11: cetasikā khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:505.13: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:505.15: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:505.17: cetasikā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:506.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:506.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:506.6: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:506.10: cetasiko eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:509.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:512.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
