patthana2.10:514.1: Cetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:515.1: Acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:516.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:517.1: Acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:518.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:519.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā acetasikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:520.1: Cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā cetasikassa ca acetasikassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:524.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:526.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:528.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:535.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:535.2: cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho;
patthana2.10:536.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:537.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:537.2: cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:538.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:539.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:540.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:540.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:541.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:541.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:542.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:542.2: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:542.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:543.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:543.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:543.4: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:545.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:545.2: cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:546.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:547.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:547.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:550.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:554.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:554.2: ahetukaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:554.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:555.1: (Evaṃ navapi pañhā kātabbā. Ahetukanti sabbattha niyāmetabbaṃ, ekaṃyeva mohaṃ mūlapade.)
patthana2.10:557.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:558.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:559.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:559.2: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:562.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:564.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:566.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava … pe … magge ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:573.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:574.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:575.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:576.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:576.2: vatthuṃ paccayā cittasampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:577.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:577.2: cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:578.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:578.2: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:579.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:579.2: cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:579.4: cittasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:581.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:582.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:583.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:583.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:583.4: kāyaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca kāyāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe … cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:586.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:590.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:591.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:592.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:593.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:593.2: vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā cittasampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:594.1: Cittasampayuttañca cittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:594.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:594.4: kāyaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca kāyāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:594.6: ahetukaṃ cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:594.10: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:597.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cattāri, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:599.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:601.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … magge tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:606.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:606.2: cittasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:607.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ (sabbattha ekaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:608.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā ekaṃ, napurejāte ekaṃ, napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:610.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:615.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:615.2: cittasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:616.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:616.2: cittasampayuttā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:617.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:617.2: cittasampayuttā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:619.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:619.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:619.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana2.10:619.18: Cittasampayutte khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:619.26: cittasampayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:620.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:620.3: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:620.6: vatthuṃ cittavippayutte khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:620.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:620.14: cittavippayuttā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:622.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:622.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:622.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, cittasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:623.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:624.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:624.3: cittasampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:625.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:625.4: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:625.7: vatthuṃ cittavippayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana2.10:627.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:627.4: phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … satta (paṭiccasadisā, pañhāghaṭanā natthi) …
patthana2.10:629.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:629.11: kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.10:630.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:632.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:632.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:634.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ) ekaṃ, āsevanapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:636.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:636.4: cittasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:636.8: cittasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:637.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:637.4: cittasampayuttā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:638.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:638.4: cittasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:638.8: cittasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:640.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:641.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:642.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:642.2: kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:644.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:645.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:646.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:646.2: cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:647.1: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:647.2: cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:647.6: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:648.1: Jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:650.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:651.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:651.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:651.6: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:653.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana2.10:654.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:655.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:656.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:657.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:657.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:658.1: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:658.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:658.6: kāyaviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca kāyāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:658.8: cittasampayutto eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:659.1: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:659.4: cittasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:659.8: cittasampayuttakā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:659.10: cittasampayuttakā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:662.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate satta.
patthana2.10:665.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:666.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:667.1: Cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:668.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:669.1: Cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:670.1: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittasampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:671.1: Cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:675.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:677.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:679.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate satta.
patthana2.10:685.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:685.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:686.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:694.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:694.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:694.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:695.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:695.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:696.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:696.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:696.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:697.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:697.3: cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:698.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:698.2: cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:698.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā. #2
patthana2.10:699.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:699.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:699.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:700.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:700.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:700.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:700.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:701.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:701.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:701.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:702.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:702.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:702.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:704.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:704.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:705.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:706.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:706.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:707.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:708.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:709.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:709.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:710.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:710.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:710.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:710.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:711.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:711.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:712.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:712.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:715.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:719.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:719.2: ahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:719.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:719.8: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:720.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:720.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:721.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:721.2: ahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:722.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:722.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.10:723.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:723.2: ahetukaṃ cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:723.5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #2
patthana2.10:724.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:724.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:724.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā khandhā ca. #3
patthana2.10:725.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:725.2: ahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:725.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:725.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:725.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:726.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:726.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:726.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:727.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:727.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:727.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:729.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:729.2: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:730.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:731.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:731.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.10:732.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:733.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:733.2: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:734.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:734.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:734.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ.
patthana2.10:737.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe cha, naupanissaye cha, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.10:739.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.10:741.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava … pe … purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca … pe … jhāne nava, magge tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:748.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:749.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:750.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:750.2: cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:751.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:751.2: vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:752.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:752.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:752.4: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:753.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:753.2: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṃ.
patthana2.10:754.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:754.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:756.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:757.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:758.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:758.4: kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇasahagatā khandhā, cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:759.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:759.2: cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:759.6: vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:760.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:760.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:760.4: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:761.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:761.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:761.6: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṃ;
patthana2.10:762.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:762.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:762.6: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:765.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:769.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:769.2: (Sabbe navapi pañhā kātabbā, paṭiccavārasadisā. Pañcaviññāṇampi kātabbaṃ. Tīṇiyeva moho.)
patthana2.10:772.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe cha, naupanissaye cha, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.10:774.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:777.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:777.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:778.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:779.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:779.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:780.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:781.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:781.2: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:782.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:783.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:784.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:786.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:791.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:791.2: cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:792.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:792.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:793.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:793.2: cittasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:795.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:795.2: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:795.6: Cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:796.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:796.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:796.5: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:796.8: vatthuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:796.11: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:796.12: Cetopariyañāṇena nocittasamuṭṭhānacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:796.20: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:797.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:797.7: vatthuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:797.16: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:798.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:798.4: nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti (paṭhamagamanasadisaṃ), nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:798.7: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:798.12: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:799.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:801.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:801.4: cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṃ katvā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:801.6: cittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:802.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:802.7: nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā cittaṃ uppajjati. #1
patthana2.10:803.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:803.8: nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:803.10: nocittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:804.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:805.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:807.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.10:808.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa … pe …

patthana2.10:813.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.10:814.7: senāsanaṃ cittaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …

patthana2.10:815.7: senāsanaṃ cittaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.10:816.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:816.7: senāsanaṃ cittaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti … pe …
patthana2.10:816.12: senāsanaṃ cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:817.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:819.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:819.5: phoṭṭhabbe aniccato … pe … vipassati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;

patthana2.10:819.11: Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:820.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:820.5: phoṭṭhabbe aniccato … pe … vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:820.8: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:821.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
