patthana2.10:821.8: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:821.9: Rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:822.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:822.11: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:823.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:823.9: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:824.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:824.8: taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:824.9: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:824.19: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:825.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:825.3: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:825.5: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:825.6: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:826.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:826.5: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:826.6: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:827.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:827.3: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:827.7: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:829.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:829.2: pacchājātā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā purejātassa imassa cittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (iminākāreneva pacchājāto vitthāretabbo) …
patthana2.10:831.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:831.4: cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:831.8: cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:832.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:832.8: cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:833.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:833.4: cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:833.8: cittasamuṭṭhānā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:834.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:836.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:836.2: cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:836.9: cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:836.11: Cittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:837.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:837.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā kaṭattārūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:837.3: nocittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:837.5: Nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:837.9: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:838.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:838.2: cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:838.6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā kaṭattārūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:838.7: cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:838.9: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:840.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:841.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:841.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:841.12: Nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:841.20: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nocittasamuṭṭhānā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:842.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:842.2: cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:842.9: kāyindriyañca dukkhindriyañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:842.11: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:842.17: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānā ca nocittasamuṭṭhānā ca indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:842.18: cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:843.1: Jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca … pe ….
patthana2.10:845.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:846.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:847.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:848.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:848.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ kaṭattā rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, cittaṃ vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu cittassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:848.12: nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:849.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:850.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:851.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:852.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:853.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.10:855.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:856.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:857.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:858.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:859.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:860.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:861.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:862.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:862.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:862.13: cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:862.15: cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:862.17: cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:863.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:864.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:867.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:870.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:871.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:872.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:873.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:874.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:875.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:876.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:877.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:878.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:882.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:884.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye tīṇi … pe … namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:886.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomagaṇanā kātabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:893.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:893.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:893.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:894.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:894.2: cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:894.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:895.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:895.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:895.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:896.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:896.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:896.5: mahābhūte paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:897.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:897.2: cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:897.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:898.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:898.2: cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:898.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:899.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:899.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:899.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:899.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:899.8: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:900.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:900.2: cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:900.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṃ, cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:901.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:901.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:901.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:901.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:901.8: cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
patthana2.10:904.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (arūpaṃ sabbaṃ uddharitabbaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṃ.)
patthana2.10:904.3: Adhipatiyā nava (mahābhūtā chasupi pañhesu kātabbā, adhipatiyā tīsu natthi.)
patthana2.10:904.4: Anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:908.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:908.2: ahetukaṃ cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:908.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.10:908.7: (Evaṃ navapi pañhā kātabbā. “Ahetukan”ti niyāmetabbaṃ. Yathā anulome labbhati evaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tīṇi moho yathā cittasamuṭṭhānaduke evameva kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:910.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:911.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:912.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:913.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana2.10:913.2: cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā.
patthana2.10:915.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana2.10:918.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava
patthana2.10:927.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:928.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:928.2: vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ, cittaṃ paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:929.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:929.2: cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittasahabhū khandhā;
patthana2.10:930.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:930.2: cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā;
patthana2.10:931.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:931.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:931.4: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:932.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:932.2: cittasahabhū khandhe ca cittañca paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasahabhū khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṃ.
patthana2.10:932.3: Cittasahabhū khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā nocittasahabhu cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:933.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:933.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:935.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:936.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … pe …
patthana2.10:936.7: (Imaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānadukaṃ paccayavāre ārammaṇasadisaṃ. Channampi imesaṃ pañcaviññāṇamūlā kātabbā. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana2.10:939.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:943.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:943.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ. Paccayavārassa pañcaviññāṇaṃ channampi mūlā kātabbā. Sabbe mahābhūte tīṇiyeva moho. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana2.10:946.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:948.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:950.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:955.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:955.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:956.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:957.1: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:957.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:958.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:959.1: Cittasahabhuñca nocittasahabhuñca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:959.2: cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:960.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:962.1: Nahetuyā pañca (tīṇi, moho), naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:964.1: Itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.
patthana2.10:969.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:969.2: cittasahabhū hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:970.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:970.2: cittasahabhū hetū cittassa nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:970.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasahabhū hetū cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:971.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:971.2: cittasahabhū hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:973.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:975.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:976.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:976.3: (Ārammaṇādhipatipi sahajātādhipatipi imesampi tiṇṇaṃ kātabbā. Navapi pañhā cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisā. Ante tīṇi ārammaṇādhipatiyeva.)
patthana2.10:978.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … nava …(cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ) …
patthana2.10:980.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:982.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:982.2: pacchājātā cittasahabhū khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:983.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:984.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (saṃkhittaṃ) …
patthana2.10:986.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:986.4: cittasahabhū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:986.8: cittasahabhū cetanā vipākānaṃ cittasahabhūnaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:987.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:987.4: cittasahabhū cetanā cittassa nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:987.8: cittasahabhū cetanā vipākassa cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:988.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:988.4: cittasahabhū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:988.8: cittasahabhū cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:990.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo (cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṃ) …
patthana2.10:990.6: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … nava …(cittasamuṭṭhānadukasadisaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ) …
patthana2.10:990.8: jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.10:992.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:992.3: cittasahabhū khandhā cittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:993.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:993.4: cittasahabhū khandhā nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:993.8: cittasahabhū khandhā purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:994.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:994.3: cittasahabhū khandhā cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:995.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:995.4: cittaṃ nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:995.15: cittaṃ purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:996.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:996.4: cittaṃ cittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:996.6: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:997.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:997.4: cittaṃ cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:997.8: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:997.12: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:998.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:998.3: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca cittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:999.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:999.4: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:999.8: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1000.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1000.2: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca cittasahabhūnañca nocittasahabhūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1002.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1003.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1004.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1005.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1006.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1007.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1008.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1008.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:1009.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1009.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1009.8: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1009.10: cittasahabhū khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1009.12: cittasahabhū khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca nocittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:1009.14: cittasahabhū khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1009.16: cittasahabhū khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasahabhussa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1009.18: cittasahabhū khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1010.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1010.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanaṃ ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:1013.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1016.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1017.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1018.1: Cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1019.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1020.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1021.1: Nocittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1022.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1023.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā nocittasahabhussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1024.1: Cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1028.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:1030.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1036.1: Cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1036.2: cittānuparivattiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittānuparivattiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1036.6: (Yathā cittasahabhūdukaṃ evaṃ imaṃ dukaṃ kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.10:1043.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1043.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho;
patthana2.10:1044.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1044.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1044.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1045.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1045.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1046.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1046.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1046.5: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1047.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1047.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā. #2
patthana2.10:1048.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1048.2: cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1048.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:1049.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1049.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1049.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1049.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana2.10:1050.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1050.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1050.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1051.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1051.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1051.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1051.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1054.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1058.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1058.2: ahetukaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1058.6: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:1059.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1059.2: ahetuke cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1060.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1060.2: ahetukaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1061.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1061.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.10:1062.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1062.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #2
patthana2.10:1063.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1063.2: ahetukaṃ cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1063.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:1064.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1064.2: ahetukaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1064.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca … pe …
patthana2.10:1064.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1064.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:1065.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1065.2: ahetuke cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ahetuke cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1065.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1066.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1066.2: ahetukaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:1068.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1069.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1069.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, cittaṃ paṭicca vatthu, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.10:1070.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1070.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana2.10:1073.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1084.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ) tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1085.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1085.2: cittaṃ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ;
patthana2.10:1086.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1086.2: cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā) tīṇi. #3
patthana2.10:1087.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1087.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1087.4: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:1088.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1088.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca cittañca paccayā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṃ.
patthana2.10:1089.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1089.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1089.4: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:1091.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1092.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1093.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1093.6: cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā, vatthuṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā.
patthana2.10:1094.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1094.2: cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:1094.6: vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:1095.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1095.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1095.6: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1095.8: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:1096.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1096.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1096.6: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā cittaṃ.
patthana2.10:1097.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānañca dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1097.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe ….
patthana2.10:1100.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1103.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:1103.2: (Evaṃ nava pañhā kātabbā. Paccayavāre pañcaviññāṇampi kātabbaṃ, tīṇiyeva moho.)
patthana2.10:1106.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1111.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:1114.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:1116.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:1121.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1121.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1121.6: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū cittassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1121.10: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1123.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1123.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:1123.6: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāne khandhe ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:1124.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1124.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti … pe …
patthana2.10:1124.7: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā cittasahabhūduke ārammaṇaṃ evaṃ kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ. Navapi pañhā.)
patthana2.10:1126.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1127.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1128.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1128.3: (Ekāyeva adhipati kātabbā, navapi pañhā. Yathā cittasahabhūdukaṃ, evaṃ kātabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
patthana2.10:1130.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (navapi pañhā cittasahabhūdukasadisā) … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava …… sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava …(paṭiccasadisā) … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nava …(paṭiccasadisā) … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava …(paccayasadisā) … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1132.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1133.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1133.2: (cittasahabhūdukasadisā, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.Tīṇipi pacchājātā. Dve. Ekamūlānaṃ ekā ghaṭanā) …
patthana2.10:1135.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (cittasahabhūdukasadisā ninnānākaraṇā. Tīṇipi sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā) … vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava …… āhārapaccayena paccayo … nava …(cittasahabhūgamanasadisā, ekaṃyeva kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ) … indriyapaccayena paccayo … nava …… jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.10:1137.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1138.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1139.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1139.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1139.6: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1140.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1140.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1140.6: cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1140.10: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1141.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1143.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭiccasadisā).
patthana2.10:1143.2: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1143.5: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1144.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1145.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1145.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1146.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1146.4: cittaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1146.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1147.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1147.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhuviññāṇañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1147.8: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1147.14: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1147.16: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:1148.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1148.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā ca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1148.8: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:1148.10: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca purejātassa imassa nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1148.12: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1148.14: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā khandhā ca cittañca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1149.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1149.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1149.9: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca cittañca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1149.11: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhā ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:1152.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1155.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1156.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1157.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1158.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1159.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1160.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.10:1162.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1163.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1167.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.10:1169.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1176.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1176.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1181.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1181.2: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1188.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1189.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1189.2: cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1189.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā bāhiraṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1190.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1190.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:1191.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1191.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1191.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1191.6: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1191.8: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1192.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1192.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ. #2

patthana2.10:1193.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1193.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1193.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3

patthana2.10:1195.7: cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca bāhiraṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca bāhirā khandhā. #2
patthana2.10:1196.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1196.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …. #3

patthana2.10:1199.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.10:1200.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1201.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1201.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.10:1202.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe ca … pe …

patthana2.10:1205.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye nava, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1209.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1210.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1210.2: ahetukaṃ cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1210.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā bāhiraṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #2
patthana2.10:1211.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1211.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:1212.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1212.2: ahetukaṃ bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1212.6: (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana2.10:1213.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1213.3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca cittaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1214.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1214.2: ahetukaṃ bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1214.4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā cittañca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā. #3
patthana2.10:1215.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1215.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1216.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1216.2: ahetukaṃ bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1216.4: ahetukaṃ cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1216.5: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā bāhiraṃ kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ;
patthana2.10:1216.6: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca bāhiraṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca vatthuñca paṭicca bāhirā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #2
patthana2.10:1217.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1217.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paṭicca dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, dve khandhe ca … pe …. #3

patthana2.10:1220.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1221.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā;
patthana2.10:1221.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:1222.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1222.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca bāhiraṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ, bāhire khandhe paṭicca vatthu, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe ….
patthana2.10:1223.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1223.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1224.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1224.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhire khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #3

patthana2.10:1225.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1226.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1226.2: bāhire khandhe ca cittañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.

patthana2.10:1230.15: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti najhānapaccayā—

patthana2.10:1234.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne pañca, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.

patthana2.10:1246.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …

patthana2.10:1246.6: bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).

patthana2.10:1246.8: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1246.10: vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
