patthana2.10:1247.3: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1247.4: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1247.6: cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:1247.7: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1247.8: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:1249.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1249.6: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1249.7: cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:1249.14: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1249.15: cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:1250.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1250.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1250.7: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1250.8: bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:1250.9: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1250.10: vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.10:1251.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1251.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1252.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1252.2: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1252.6: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1252.8: cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā).
patthana2.10:1252.9: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1252.10: cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1255.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1259.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1259.2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paccayā ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
patthana2.10:1259.3: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Evaṃ navapi pañhā kātabbā. Pañcaviññāṇampi pavesetvā tīṇiyeva moho.)
patthana2.10:1262.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana2.10:1264.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:1267.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1268.1: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1268.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1268.6: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1268.10: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1268.11: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1269.1: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1269.2: bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1269.7: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana2.10:1270.1: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana2.10:1271.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana2.10:1273.1: Evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.10:1278.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1278.2: bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1278.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1279.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1279.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1280.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1280.2: bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1280.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1282.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1282.6: Cittaṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:1283.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1283.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:1283.9: pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1283.16: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1283.17: Ariyā bāhire pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.10:1283.19: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, rūpe … pe …
patthana2.10:1283.21: vatthuṃ bāhire khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:1283.24: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1283.25: Cetopariyañāṇena bāhiracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.10:1283.29: rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1283.33: bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1284.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1284.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1284.15: vatthuṃ bāhire khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1284.24: bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1285.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1285.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ).
patthana2.10:1285.7: Bāhire khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:1285.12: rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1285.16: bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1286.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1288.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1289.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1289.4: cittaṃ garuṃ katvā bāhirā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:1289.6: cittādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1289.9: ajjhattikaṃ cittaṃ garuṃ katvā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.10:1290.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1291.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1293.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1293.2: purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1294.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1294.2: purimā purimā bāhirā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1295.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi, samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava, sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava (paṭiccasadisā), aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … pañca (paṭiccasadisā), nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.10:1297.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1298.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1298.18: (Tīṇipi pūretvā kātabbā, cittassāti kātabbā, sampayuttakānañcāti kātabbā.)
patthana2.10:1299.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1301.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1301.6: kāyaṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1302.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1302.6: kāyaṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1303.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1303.6: kāyaṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:1303.12: kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1304.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1304.10: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1305.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1305.10: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1306.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1306.9: taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti.
patthana2.10:1306.10: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1306.12: vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1307.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1307.5: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1308.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā bāhirassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1308.3: Cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca bāhirānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1308.5: kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca bāhirānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1308.6: rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1308.8: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1309.1: Ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1309.3: Cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1309.7: rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1311.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1311.2: pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1311.4: Pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa bāhirassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1311.6: Pacchājātā ajjhattikā khandhā purejātassa imassa ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo (evaṃ navapi pañhā kātabbā), āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1313.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1313.4: bāhirā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1313.8: bāhirā cetanā vipākānaṃ bāhirānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1314.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1314.8: bāhirā cetanā vipākassa cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1315.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1315.4: bāhirā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1315.8: bāhirā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1317.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1317.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā āhārā ajjhattikānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1318.1: Ajjhattiko dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1318.2: ajjhattikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1318.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1318.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattikā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1319.1: Bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1319.2: bāhirā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1319.5: bāhiro kabaḷīkāro āhāro bāhirassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1320.1: Bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1320.3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā āhārā cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;

patthana2.10:1508.2: noupādā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1509.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1509.2: noupādā hetū upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1510.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1510.2: noupādā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1512.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1512.7: rase vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:1512.10: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1512.13: rasāyatanaṃ jivhāviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upādā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1513.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1513.6: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:1513.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1513.17: nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1513.18: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese … pe …
patthana2.10:1513.22: phoṭṭhabbe noupādā khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;
patthana2.10:1513.25: cetopariyañāṇena noupādācittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana2.10:1513.30: noupādā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1515.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1515.8: rase vatthuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana2.10:1516.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1516.8: uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1516.13: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā … pe …
patthana2.10:1516.18: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1516.19: phoṭṭhabbe noupādā khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana2.10:1516.21: noupādādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1517.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1517.3: noupādādhipati upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1518.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1518.3: noupādādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1520.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1520.2: purimā purimā noupādā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ noupādā khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1523.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1524.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1524.7: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.10:1526.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1526.9: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti.
patthana2.10:1527.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1528.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1528.4: phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca noupādā khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1530.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1530.2: pacchājātā noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa noupādā kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1530.4: Pacchājātā noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1530.6: Pacchājātā noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1533.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1533.4: noupādā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1533.8: noupādā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1534.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1534.4: noupādā cetanā upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1534.8: noupādā cetanā upādā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1535.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1535.4: noupādā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1535.8: noupādā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1537.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1537.2: vipāko noupādā eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:1539.1: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1539.2: kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa upādā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1539.4: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa noupādā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1539.6: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1540.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1540.2: noupādā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1542.1: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1542.6: kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa rūpajīvitindriyaṃ noupādā kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1542.9: upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1543.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi;
patthana2.10:1544.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1544.2: cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1546.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi, maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi;
patthana2.10:1548.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1548.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu noupādā khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1549.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1549.4: noupādā khandhā noupādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1549.5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā khandhā noupādā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1549.7: noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa noupādā kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1550.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1550.4: noupādā khandhā upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1550.8: noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1551.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1551.4: noupādā khandhā upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1551.8: noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1553.1: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1554.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1554.4: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu noupādā khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1555.1: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1555.4: imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1555.6: upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1556.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1556.4: noupādā eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana2.10:1556.10: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana2.10:1556.12: dve mahābhūtā dvinnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (yāva asaññasattā).
patthana2.10:1556.19: noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa noupādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1557.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1557.4: noupādā khandhā upādā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1557.8: noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1558.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā ca noupādā ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1558.4: noupādā eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ upādā ca noupādā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.10:1558.10: noupādā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1559.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1559.4: noupādā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa upādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1559.6: noupādā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca upādā kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1560.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1560.4: cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1560.8: noupādā eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe …
patthana2.10:1560.12: paṭisandhikkhaṇe noupādā eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca … pe ….
patthana2.10:1560.18: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca noupādā khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1560.20: noupādā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa noupādā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1560.22: noupādā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca noupādā kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1561.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.10:1561.4: noupādā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa upādā kāyassa ca noupādā kāyassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.10:1561.6: noupādā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca upādā ca noupādā ca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1564.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cha, indriye satta, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava, natthiyā ekaṃ, vigate ekaṃ, avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1567.1: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1568.1: Upādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1569.1: Upādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1570.1: Noupādā dhammo noupādā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1571.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1572.1: Noupādā dhammo upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1573.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1574.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā noupādā dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1575.1: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammā upādā dhammassa ca noupādā dhammassa ca pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #3
patthana2.10:1579.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:1581.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.10:1583.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri … pe … (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.10:1590.1: Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1590.2: upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1590.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1590.10: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana2.10:1591.1: Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1592.1: Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1592.2: upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana2.10:1593.1: Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1593.2: anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1594.1: Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.10:1594.2: upādinne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1596.1: Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—
patthana2.10:1596.2: upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana2.10:1597.1: Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—

patthana2.10:1711.28: phoṭṭhabbe anupādinne khandhe aniccato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati;

patthana2.10:1788.1: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1789.1: Upādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1790.1: Upādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1791.1: Anupādinno dhammo anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana2.10:1792.1: Anupādinno dhammo upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.10:1793.1: Anupādinno dhammo upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1794.1: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā upādinnassa dhammassa purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #1
patthana2.10:1795.1: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā anupādinnassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. #2
patthana2.10:1796.1: Upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā upādinnassa ca anupādinnassa ca dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.10:1800.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), naāhāre aṭṭha … pe … nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:1802.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri … pe … naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye cattāri, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana2.10:1804.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā dve (anulomamātikā kātabbā) … pe … avigate nava.
